information.name: notifications
information.description: A simple UCRM Plugin to send notifications for items not currently built-in.
information.author: Ryan Spaeth <rspaeth@mvqn.net>

configuration.label: Use HTML?
configuration.description: If enabled, will attempt to send messages in HTML format.

configuration.label: Client Types
configuration.description: The type of Client events for which notifications should be sent.

configuration.label: Client Recipients
configuration.description: A comma separated list of email addresses to which Client notifications should be sent.
